title: playing in silver
body: So i've been mentioning a lot that lately it's been impossible to carry with teams being 0/5 or greater by a few minutes in, i just played another game, i'm 4/0/0 top lane against irelia, team starts feeding so hard that i get tower dove, enemy team destroys us, why can't i get teams that don't feed? the other 5 players got a team that doesn't feed? why is a guaranteed loss when i go in solo every game, yet if i duo the games are winnable? i really don't get it.
